sense.def: ① Alternative Names dou zhen du 痘疹毒 , smallpox papules poison. Etiological Agent. of du qi 毒氣① , poison qi, that brings forth dou zhen 痘疹 , smallpox papules. XEDZFL si wei sheng ma ge gen tang 四味升麻葛根湯：恐虛其表而 痘毒不能托出也 , “It is to be feared that the outer region is depleted and the smallpox poison cannot be discharged”.

② Pathological Condition of smallpox with extreme skin rashes, festering, serious swelling and massive purulence. Xiao er dou zhen fang lun 小兒痘疹方論 Lun dou zhen zhi fa 論痘疹治法：一小兒痘毒，遍 身腐潰，膿水淋漓 , “When a child is affected by smallpox poison , its entire body will rot and fester, with massive flow of pus liquid”.
